Name: Story Mission
Contents[1]: Commandant, please allow me to remind you that each operation is accompanied by a variety of missions.
Contents[2]: After completing the mission, you will receive a large number of supplies. Please make sure that you collect them in time.
Contents[3]: This will help us acquire advanced equipment earlier, which will be useful in future operations.
Contents[4]: Let us do so next.

Name: Get Constructs, level up
Contents[1]: Commandant, thanks to everyone's hard work, I can finally rejoin the fight!
Contents[2]: Before that, please upgrade and tune me, then assign the battle position for me.
Contents[3]: Commandant... I can't wait to fight alongside with everyone together.

Name: Improve skill
Contents[1]: Commandant, we Constructs will become more proficient at using our skills as we fight in more battles.
Contents[2]: Please upgrade my skill level so that I can bring out its true potential.
Contents[3]: If possible... please pay attention to my performance in the next battle.

Name: Novice Mission
Contents[1]: Greetings, Commandant of the Gray Raven squad. There was something that I forgot to tell you.
Contents[2]: Novice missions have been set for all first-timer squads in this operation. Squads can earn extra supplies by completing these goals.
Contents[3]: I'm sure you'll have no problem clearing them. I have high hopes for you.
Contents[4]: Good luck!

Name: Promote Construct
Contents[1]: Commandant. The Constructs have their own military ranks.
Contents[2]: It not only symbolizes honor, but raising their ranks will also increase their performance.
Contents[3]: Complete specific missions to promote a Construct.
Contents[4]: I look forward to bringing honor to the team, Commandant.

Name: Sign-in
Contents[1]: Commandant, battles can be long and difficult. In return for your daily efforts...
Contents[2]: Signing in will earn you supplies every day! They will help you in your journey.
Contents[3]: The supply center has prepared a special weapon for you as your first sign-in reward.
Contents[4]: Gray Raven will always be with you, Commandant!

Name: Mission - Daily
Contents[1]: Commandant, you should have your own mission board, right?
Contents[2]: In addition to your main missions, there are daily missions that can be completed for that day.
Contents[3]: Don't underestimate these mission rewards!
Contents[4]: Now, let's take a look at the mission board.

Name: Research System
Contents[1]: Hello, Commandant of the Gray Raven squad!
Contents[2]: Who am I? Don't you worry about that. We'll meet soon.
Contents[3]: Now, I know what you're thinking...
Contents[4]: You want more Constructs to join your squad, right?
Contents[5]: Try out this R&D Ticket. Consider it a gift!

Name: Main Quest Guide
Contents[1]: As battles get more difficult, we need to ensure a steady flow of supplies.
Contents[2]: Keep it up and complete your major missions.
Contents[3]: This will ensure that we have enough resources as our enemies get tougher.
Contents[4]: Let's strive for humanity together, Commandant.

Name: Daily - Character EXP
Contents[1]: Outside of main missions, you can also have your Constructs take part in training programs.
Contents[2]: Training allows us to gain experience in simulation battles.
Contents[3]: Please remember to schedule training sessions for us in the future.

Name: Normal Shop
Contents[1]: A new support squad has arrived in the region, Commandant. They are eager to meet with you.
Contents[2]: In addition to delivering supplies, they will also trade resources with you.
Contents[3]: Let's try trading something with them.

Name: Tutorial Stage
Contents[1]: Hello, Commandant! How are you getting along with the Constructs of Gray Raven?
Contents[2]: What's that? Still feel like you don't know much about them?
Contents[3]: Don't worry, I have a tutorial for you to help you understand them.
Contents[4]: And here are some Black Cards to reward you for mastering it all.
Contents[5]: So, please familiarize yourself with the abilities of the Constructs!

Name: Skill Stage
Contents[1]: Commandant, are you running into skill point shortage issues when trying to upgrade Construct skills?
Contents[2]: Battle Exercises are a great way to get more skill points.
Contents[3]: Try it out if you need them.

Name: Coin Stage
Contents[1]: These cogs contain an important material used in our Construct frames.
Contents[2]: A lot of cogs are required to extract enough materials to upgrade our frames.
Contents[3]: Cogs can be found in many places, especially in Cogs Galore.

Name: Equipment EXP Stage
Contents[1]: Commandant, our equipment are made from special materials.
Contents[2]: Upgrading them requires the same special materials.
Contents[3]: We can find these upgrade materials from Logistics Maintenance.

Name: Equipment Overclock Stage
Contents[1]: Commandant, equipment eventually reaches a point where they can no longer be upgraded.
Contents[2]: Overclock materials are required to enhance them further.
Contents[3]: This will allow you to enhance equipment to a higher level.
Contents[4]: You can get Overclock materials from Military Hardware.

Name: Challenge - Trial Mission
Contents[1]: Looks like you're ready to move past basic battle operations.
Contents[2]: I've seen many outstanding Commandants rise through the ranks, and I see the makings of one in you.
Contents[3]: Try these challenges to prove your worth.
Contents[4]: Why am I helping you? It's only to collect more data.

Name: Story Mission - Hard
Contents[1]: Commandant, do you remember the battles that you participated in?
Contents[2]: You usually only get to see one side of the story.
Contents[3]: Over time, however, records from other sources become available.
Contents[4]: Essentially, you have the chance to observe what happened from another perspective.
Contents[5]: So, let's trying replaying the past, shall we?

Name: Auto Clear
Contents[1]: Once we're familiar with the tactics of a particular operation...
Contents[2]: The risk of battling becomes greatly reduced. This enables the Auto Clear feature.
Contents[3]: This allows us to complete familiar missions without the need of your command.
Contents[4]: This way, you'll be able to focus your attention on more important missions.

Name: High-rank Equipment Stage
Contents[1]: High-rank Memories are important to improving the combative capabilities of a Construct.
Contents[2]: The more difficult the Combat Supply mission, the higher the chance to get high-rank Memories.
Contents[3]: Now, let's try more difficult missions to test the limits of the squad!

Name: Construct - Details
Contents[1]: Greetings, Commandant of the Gray Raven squad!
Contents[2]: Curious about me?
Contents[3]: We all have our own personal files.
Contents[4]: You may learn a thing or two about us Constructs when you look through them!

Name: Trial Zone
Contents[1]: We meet again, Commandant of Gray Raven.
Contents[2]: Have you noticed that you now have access to the Trial Zone?
Contents[3]: The Trial Zone offers the opportunity to try out various prototype projects under development...
Contents[4]: ... or, depending on the perspective, practical tricks by the research team.

Name: Construct Army
Contents[1]: More and more Constructs have joined our team.
Contents[2]: You can view your Construct roster and status on the Construct Army page.
Contents[3]: Reach Construct development milestones to get special materials.
Contents[4]: I'm sure you'll find them useful...

Name: Co-op
Contents[1]: Here's a message for you, rookie.
Contents[2]: There have been sightings of very powerful Corrupted.
Contents[3]: You should not attempt to combat these powerful foes on your own.
Contents[4]: Join a Co-op operation to prove your ability to work with others.
Contents[5]: I have high expectations for you, Gray Raven.

Name: Support
Contents[1]: Most operations often involve multiple squads.
Contents[2]: You can request assistance from other squads before a battle.
Contents[3]: Try issuing a call for Constructs from other squads.

Name: Side Story
Contents[1]: Commandant, remember Mr. Hassen's tip?
Contents[2]: The more you know, the more decisions you face.
Contents[3]: As your relationship with Constructs improves, you will be able to access more of their personal files.
Contents[4]: Let me give you some advice. As you learn more about their past...
Contents[5]: Make sure you treasure your present and future with them.

Name: Construct - Outfit
Contents[1]: Commandant, we have received a new coating from HQ.
Contents[2]: Coatings are purely cosmetic and do not affect Construct performance.
Contents[3]: Um... Commandant, would you like me to put on a new coating?

Name: Bounty Mission
Contents[1]: Let's do some bounty missions, Commandant!
Contents[2]: Oh, right. I need to explain them to you.
Contents[3]: Completing bounty missions will earn your team a lot of experience.
Contents[4]: But more importantly, bounty hunting sounds real cool!

Name: Infrastructure and Dormitory
Contents[1]: Commandant, the Dormitory is finally open!
Contents[2]: This symbolizes that we are ready to take root on Earth for the long haul.
Contents[3]: I'm looking forward to living in the dorms with everybody!
Contents[4]: You can also modify and upgrade the Dormitory.
Contents[5]: I'm sure you'll make it a great place!

Name: Challenge - War Zone
Contents[1]: Which would you prefer, competition or cooperation?
Contents[2]: Whether for honor or for resources, everything in the War Zone is earned through competition.
Contents[3]: Earn a high enough rank to access a new War Zone...
Contents[4]: ...Which will grant even better rewards.
Contents[5]: This is the ultimate trial ground for Gray Raven. How far can you go?

Name: Challenge - Phantom Pain Cage
Contents[1]: Good. I was worried that you won't pick up the receiver.
Contents[2]: I've been analyzing Gray Raven's battle logs.
Contents[3]: It looks like those special Corrupted have been giving you a hard time.
Contents[4]: I'm giving you permission to use the training facilities to simulate training against these special Corrupted.
Contents[5]: Get used to fighting them quickly, because enemies will only get tougher.

Name: Exploration
Contents[1]: Are you as curious about this world as I am, Commandant of Gray Raven?
Contents[2]: I long to return to Earth as much as you do, even though I was not born there.
Contents[3]: There are so many secrets waiting to be discovered in the wastelands...
Contents[4]: If you're interested, I can tell you about some... special places that we've found.

Name: Medal System
Contents[1]: Greetings, Commandant. You now have access to the Medal system.
Contents[2]: Medals are issued to those who have contributed to the cause of the United Human Front. You can find yours in the Central Database.

Name: Medal 1
Contents[1]: I want to talk to you about Gray Raven's recent performance.
Contents[2]: Your recent performance has been exemplary, and you have earned the medal of Ace Commandant.
Contents[3]: With achievement also comes expectation. I look forward to your next victory.
Contents[4]: I've sent you the certification link. Go ahead and claim your medal!

Name: Medal 2
Contents[1]: It has been a long time since I've seen so many dots on the monitor. These dots represent the strongholds of humanity.
Contents[2]: You've completed the mission successfully. And your contributions to Babylonia are well-noted.
Contents[3]: I hereby issue you the Medal of Pioneers in recognition of your achievements. I look forward to your future endeavors!
Contents[4]: Go, claim this medal of glory now.

Name: Medal 3
Contents[1]: Hmph, you are full of surprises.
Contents[2]: It's been a long time since I last saw a Commandant reach 1 million Progress. You were only a little slower than my performance when I was young.
Contents[3]: You should be proud of it. It's an exclusive club of two.
Contents[4]: You are now authorized for the medal. Claim it now!

Name: Medal 4
Contents[1]: This is the 9th liberation report from you. It seemed like an eternity ago that you and your team fought in your first battle...
Contents[2]: You and your Constructs have grown into a true team, a bright beacon in the darkness. Your companions also indicate your strength.
Contents[3]: Here is the Medal of Light Tower in honor of your achievements as the guiding light of humanity.
Contents[4]: Now share the joy with your comrades!

Name: Medal 5
Contents[1]: I've seen you overcome many challenges in your path.
Contents[2]: The path of leadership that you walk brings back many memories.
Contents[3]: On behalf of the United Humanity Front, I hereby issue to you the Medal of Human Leader.
Contents[4]: From now on, your duty is not to earn the approval of others, but to bring them hope and point them towards the future. See you on the bridge.

Name: Clear Stronghold Chapter 1
Contents[1]: Congratulations on the capture of City 015, Commandant. The Engineering Force is already on its way to repair the city's Central Purification Filter.
Contents[2]: Be careful, however, as there are still pockets of Corrupted on the outskirts.

Name: Clear Stronghold Chapter 2
Contents[1]: A small step for your team, a great step towards victory over the Punishing Virus.
Contents[2]: Gray Raven's efforts have led to the full retreat of the Ascendant from this city, as well as the establishment of our first major stronghold on Earth. I look forward to your future performance.

Name: Clear Stronghold Chapter 3
Contents[1]: You have not only recaptured a stronghold for humanity, but also preserved the artifacts of the museum. Good job.
Contents[2]: The Archaeological Team sends their regards. We'll make sure that you're rewarded!

Name: Clear Stronghold Chapter 4
Contents[1]: Good job completing your mission in the harsh environment of the desert.
Contents[2]: We've struggled to make headways in this region for a long time, now, we've finally established a foothold here thanks to you. The work of Babylonia can finally be carried out smoothly.

Name: Clear Stronghold Chapter 5
Contents[1]: The data that you obtained from the test area are of great... historical importance to the development of M.I.N.D. technology.
Contents[2]: I thank you on behalf of the education center under the Science Council.

Name: Clear Stronghold Chapter 6
Contents[1]: I'm sure you understand that details regarding the Luna City Arsenal are classified.
Contents[2]: That's why we're not in a position to hold a public award ceremony for you.
Contents[3]: Still, you should know that we appreciate your work.

Name: Clear Stronghold Chapter 7
Contents[1]: The murals... Sagemachina... interesting.
Contents[2]: Your capture of these ruins allows us to investigate them up close. Good job.

Name: Gift Mission Lee
Contents[1]: Thanks for spending time with them.
Contents[2]: We've been able to enjoy the holidays thanks to you.
Contents[3]: Have a good rest. I've prepared a little gift for you back at HQ. Check it out later!

Name: Gift Mission Liv
Contents[1]: I've never been part of an event like this... It feels a little strange.
Contents[2]: But I enjoy seeing the smile on everybody's faces.
Contents[3]: Here's a little gift. I hope you like it.

Name: Gift Mission Kamui
Contents[1]: Hey Commandant, guess what I have for you?
Contents[2]: It's my special New Year present!
Contents[3]: Wait, where did it go? I thought I put it in my bag...
Contents[4]: Did I already send it out? Let's go take a look!

Name: Gift Mission Lucia
Contents[1]: Happy New Year, Commandant.
Contents[2]: Thank you for all that you've done this past year.
Contents[3]: May the next year be just as productive.

Name: Gift Mission Nanami
Contents[1]: Commandant, Commandant! Happy New Year!
Contents[2]: Miss me already?
Contents[3]: Guess what, Nanami’s got a New Year present for you!
Contents[4]: Happy? Like it? This is the part where you praise Nanami!

Name: Gift Mission Celica
Contents[1]: It was quite a surprise when you asked me to come over for Spring Festival.
Contents[2]: But I really enjoyed it!
Contents[3]: Here's a little something in return.
Contents[4]: Keep it a secret between us, ok?

Name: Gift Mission Karenina
Contents[1]: I'm definitely not saying that I enjoyed Spring Festival with you guys!
Contents[2]: I'm just saying that if you're gonna have a party, you need fireworks!
Contents[3]: Luckily for you, I've got them prepared.
Contents[4]: And since it's boring to watch fireworks by myself, I'll let you watch them together with me.

Name: Valentine's Message: Lee
Contents[1]: I've already uploaded today's battle data analysis report onto the system. Once we've collected enough data, I'll hand in a Construct refinement report to the Council.
Contents[2]: Upgrading a Construct's frame needs to be done with extreme caution, and requires constant optimization and fine-tuning. It's not something that can be done in a day, but it's definitely not meaningless.
Contents[3]: This is the end of today's report... By the way, I found out that today is a celebration in the west back in the Golden Age where... people gave gifts to those dear to them.
Contents[4]: Don't get me wrong, I just think that celebrations are a core part of humanity, and for a certain someone to miss out on this important event would be... unfortunate.
Contents[5]: Which is why, in order to make sure you don't miss out, I'll... always be here by your side, celebration or not. Happy Valentine's, KURONAME.

Name: Valentine's Message: Liv
Contents[1]: Commandant, today is a very important day in the Golden Age western culture, do you know what it is? It's the day of love!
Contents[2]: Back in the Golden Age, people on Earth would give chocolates to the people they love, and the streets were filled with happy couples.
Contents[3]: ...I feel happy just thinking about it. I hope the world will be filled with love again once we reclaim Earth.
Contents[4]: I wanted to experience it too, so I made some chocolates...
Contents[5]: If it's not too much, will you accept these, Commandant?

Name: Valentine's Message: Kamui
Contents[1]: Commandant! Happy Valentine's Day! I read that on Valentine's Day, you confessed your love. In the visual nov... I mean, the information I found! Valentine's Day is the day you spend with the most important person in your life!
Contents[2]: And to me, that person is, of course, you, Commandant! Am I your most important person too, Commandant? I am, right? Right?
Contents[3]: Hehe, anyway, I've prepared Valentine Serum chocolate for you! I've put tons of sugar in it. Nothing says Valentine's Day like it, right?
Contents[4]: If you have time... could you come to my room tonight... I found a fighting game popular during the Golden Age! You're gonna love it! We can play it all night long!

Name: Valentine's Message: Lucia
BtnContent: I like Lucia too. Happy Valentine's Day.
Contents[1]: Commandant, for all the times we've gone through, thank you for your leadership and guidance... Why did I say these things?
Contents[2]: ...According to the information of Golden Age festivals, today is the day where people expressed their feelings to their beloved with chocolate as a gift. Is it correct?
Contents[3]: I see, so the information is true... You haven't misunderstood. Commandant is no doubt the one I like.
Contents[4]: I've prepared hand-made chocolates for you. But I'm not... very familiar with this. I promise I will work harder on it, Commandant.

Name: Valentine's Message: Nanami
Contents[1]: Hey hey! It's Nanami! Commandant, do you know what is today?
Contents[2]: Yep! It's Valentine's Day! Do you feel your heart is racing a bit faster?
Contents[3]: Speaking of Valentine's Day, chocolate is the thing we definitely can't miss!
Contents[4]: Ms. Celica said if there is a very very important person to you, you have to make a very very yummy chocolate as a present. So Nanami has spent a whole night... or two days... a long time anyway, to make this!
Contents[5]: You have to enjoy it slowly! Nanami won't allow you to swallow it in only one bite!

Name: Valentine's Message: Bianca
Contents[1]: I hope I didn't catch you at a bad time, Commandant of Gray Raven.
Contents[2]: According to the database, today is a vital western festival during the Golden Age, Valentine's Day.
Contents[3]: On this day, people used to make a chocolate that contained their feelings and give it to the person who was important to them.
Contents[4]: If you don't mind, please accept this. I don't know if you like sweets or not... but I hope you will like it.

Name: Valentine's Message: Karenina
Contents[1]: What? I couldn't care less about this boring festival.
Contents[2]: But, well, since you look forward to that, I've prepared chocolates for you, just because I don't want to let you down.
Contents[3]: Hmph, they're not exquisite, but I'm sure they will impress you!

Name: Valentine's Message: Ayla
Contents[1]: Commandant! Happy Valentine's Day! On this day, what cannot be missed is chocolate!
Contents[2]: Hehe... Look! Special chocolate made by me! The proportion of sugar, milk and cocoa is 1:2:4, which is a golden formula showed in Golden Age movies! Also I've used solidified serum as stuffing!
Contents[3]: By the way, this serum is slightly different. After all... we've shared some mutual secrets, right?
Contents[4]: What? Have I tasted it before? How could I taste it before you do? It's a big gift to KURONAME!

Name: Valentine's Message: Watanabe
Contents[1]: BZZZZ—Can you hear me? The signal here's a bit unstable... What's with that face? You worried about me? As you can see, there's nothing to worry about. I'm fine.
Contents[2]: This is for you, made with raw dark chocolate and Serum. I used to eat this kind of chocolate in the army all the time to refresh myself.
Contents[3]: Yeah, I made it. What? It's not that hard to make chocolate... Why am I giving you chocolate? Do you really need me to explain?
Contents[4]: Happy Valentine's Day. I'll be waiting for you outside Oasis later. You're worried about me, right? Then come see for yourself that I'm fine.

Name: Valentine's Message: Lucia
Contents[1]: *WARNING! The communication channel has been hacked! Please disconnect it immediately!*
Contents[2]: This is for you.
Contents[3]: I'm sure you won't feel alone today as you have Gray Ravens by your side.
Contents[4]: But still... Happy Valentine's Day.
